statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_training;
SELECT volunteer_name, training_name FROM volunteer_training WHERE certification_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, training_name, certification_date FROM volunteer_training WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT id, volunteer_name, training_name FROM volunteer_training WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY training_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_training WHERE volunteer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT id, volunteer_name, training_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM volunteer_training WHERE id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, training_name FROM volunteer_training WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, COUNT(*) AS training_count FROM volunteer_training GROUP BY volunteer_name;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_training WHERE expiration_date < '2023-12-31' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(expiration_date, certification_date)) AS avg_certification_duration FROM volunteer_training;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT volunteer_name, certification_name FROM volunteers INNER JOIN certifications ON volunteers.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT volunteer_name, certification_expiry_date FROM volunteers WHERE certification_expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_name DESC
SELECT certifications.certification_name, volunteers.volunteer_name FROM certifications INNER JOIN volunteers ON certifications.certification_id = volunteers.certification_id

SELECT certifications.certification_name, volunteers.volunteer_name FROM certifications JOIN volunteers ON certifications.certification_id = volunteers.certification_id WHERE certifications.certification_name LIKE '%CPR%'
SELECT certification_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM expiration_date) AS expiry_year FROM certifications
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT volunteer_id, first_name, last_name FROM volunteers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM volunteer_training_certifications WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_training_certifications ORDER BY certification_id DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM certification_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%Management%';
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM volunteer_training_certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 123;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM volunteer_training_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%First Aid%';
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT volunteer_id, first_name, last_name FROM volunteers INNER JOIN volunteer_training_certifications ON volunteers.volunteer_id = volunteer_training_certifications.volunteer_id WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT training_id, name, instructor FROM Training ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT cert_id, certification_date, expiration_date FROM Certification WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT compliance_id, status, review_date FROM Compliance WHERE status = 'Pending' AND review_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT v.name, t.name, c.certification_date FROM Volunteer v JOIN Certification c ON v.id = c.volunteer_id JOIN Training t ON c.training_id = t.training_id WHERE c.certification_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT v.name, t.name, co.status FROM Volunteer v JOIN Certification c ON v.id = c.volunteer_id JOIN Training t ON c.training_id = t.training_id JOIN Compliance co ON c.cert_id = co.certification_id WHERE co.review_date IS NULL;
SELECT v.name, t.name, c.certification_date FROM Certification c JOIN Training t ON c.training_id = t.training_id JOIN Volunteer v ON c.volunteer_id = v.id WHERE t.duration >= 3;
SELECT * FROM training_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM training_certifications WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, email_address FROM volunteers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT training_date, CERT.certification_name FROM volunteer_training VT JOIN training_certifications CERT ON VT.certification_id = CERT.certification_id;
SELECT TS.session_id, TS.session_date, TI.instructor_name, TS.location FROM training_sessions TS JOIN training_instructors TI ON TS.instructor_id = TI.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, email_address FROM volunteers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT training_certifications.certification_name, training_sessions.location FROM training_certifications INNER JOIN volunteer_training ON training_certifications.certification_id = volunteer_training.certification_id INNER JOIN training_sessions ON volunteer_training.training_id = training_sessions.training_id;
SELECT training_sessions.session_date, training_sessions.start_time, training_sessions.end_time FROM training_sessions WHERE location = 'Main Hall' ORDER BY session_date DESC;

SELECT volunteers.volunteer_name, training_certifications.certification_name, training_sessions.session_date FROM volunteers INNER JOIN volunteer_training ON volunteers.volunteer_id = volunteer_training.volunteer_id INNER JOIN training_certifications ON volunteer_training.certification_id = training_certifications.certification_id INNER JOIN training_sessions ON volunteer_training.training_id = training_sessions.training_id WHERE volunteers.contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
